content: aloha friends around the world i am so excited to be included as a designer in the fatw3 cal gauge rounds 1-5 = 5 my square was inspired by my granddaughter who lives in hawai i with her mom & dad i guess they re okay too lol she loves the outdoors and anything with wheels but her favorite is to facetime tutu & pop-pops at midnight apparently she doesn t understand time zones yet perhaps she will when she turns 3 i hope you enjoy making this square as much as i ve enjoyed designing it for you i can t wait to see everyone s beautiful makes mahalo & happy stitching divina p s a giant thank you to the team at cal crochet-a-long for having luna stella translated into 7 additional languages **dutch** **french** **korean** **swedish** coming soon *danish* *german* *hebrew* link to blog post https //calcrochetalong com/2019/06/21/luna-stella-by-divina-rocca/
